name: Recipe: Vegetarian Abalone
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Vegetarian Abalone.

value.name: Matsutake
value.desc: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

value.name: Snapdragon
value.desc: Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice, it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.

value.name: Vegetarian Abalone
value.desc: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. The matsutake has been sliced thin and fried till golden before pouring the sauce. The matsutake meat is sumptuous and has flavor to match that of fresh abalone — almost enough to make you think it was the real thing.

value.name: Hu Tao
value.desc: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.

value.name: Ghostly March
value.desc: Hu Tao's specialty. The round-faced ghouls seem quite cute, squeezed into a pile as they are. But if you were to fall to temptation and try but one of them, you may yet come to regret it for a long while... After all, this plate is full of top-quality, taste-bud-blasting— Actually, what on earth is this stuff, anyway?

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Purchase from Verr Goldet at Wangshu Inn</color>
